memberdef.name: virt_api
memberdef.initializer: = { drm_virtual_output_create, drm_virtual_output_set_gbm_format, drm_virtual_output_set_submit_frame_cb, drm_virtual_output_get_fence_fd, drm_virtual_output_buffer_released, drm_virtual_output_finish_frame }

briefdescription.para: Create a drm_crtc for virtual output.

detaileddescription.para: It will leave its ID and pipe zeroed, as virtual outputs should not use real CRTC's. Also, as this is a fake CRTC, it will not try to populate props.

briefdescription.para: Create a drm_plane for virtual output.

detaileddescription.para: Call drm_virtual_plane_destroy to clean up the plane.

parameterdescription.para: Output to create internal plane for
